captions.text: geowhit88 asked
Since you two are so perfectly well
I'd like to know what the biggest fight that you have got in
and provide all the delicious details
So... this is bit of a difficult question
because we don't really fight
We like to control our emotions and discuss things rationally like adults
For example, today we were going to have pizza
and I'm gonna have pineapple and ham pizza
I thought we were going to have pepperoni and mushrooms, it's my favorite
No..
We agreed upon hawaiian pizza
But we had hawaiian last time
I thought we agreed upon pepperoni and mushrooms
I'm getting pepperoni and mushrooms
No you're not
Stop it
I did it first
Selfish
Hmmm.
I won that one
I make the differ
Make the differ all you want
It's pepperoni and mushrooms
No it's not,  it's gonna be hawaiian
Definitely i won it
Definitely not
But seriously, we don't eat pizza anymore
It makes us fat
But seriously
I don't want to make people disgust and angry and sad
but we really don't fight..
AT ALL..
The whole concept of fighting is silly to us
because we're a married couple we love each other a lot
we like each other a lot
we are with each other every day
we just know how to avoid making that person upset
I mean Why would I wanna fight with Martina?
I have full control of my actions
and I can control my emotions as well
I would never want to hurt her or harm her in any ways
so I have no urge to fight her whatsoever
So whenever we know that we are getting on each other nerves
we will be like
OMG I'm so sorry I didn't mean it that way
or Let's try this again
or OK I don't want to sound this way
or just we'll immediately stop and be like
something is going wrong here
We really value our communication skills with each other
and I think that's the most important thing in our relationship
But sometimes we notice we are snippier with each other
which is usually a result of us not eating for awhile
and us being more emotional
so as soon as we feel that way we're like
Wait a second, when did we eat last?
let's go eat some foods
And after we eat our food
and our stomaches are full we're like
Lalalalalal~ Lalalala
I love you sunshine
I love you too ..
Everybody is watching us
at home
There are times we get into disagreements and argue with each other
and that's usually the perspective of creative manager
and management team
It's never as husband and wife
It has to do with like making our movies and having creative differences
This is more like business and professional disagreements with each other
but never like relationship kind of disagreements with each other
So when it comes to scripting Music Mondays
it's actually pretty difficult
because I'll have an idea what I think is funny
and I'll have an idea what I think is funny
and then sometimes we'll completely match each other
but in other times we don't see eye to eyes
That's the biggest problem that we have as a full time bloggers together
it's not just like one person hailing it all
We're both trying to balance the work with each other
I feel like we're talking about the the difficulty of working together
rather than any arguments
I'm sorry
we don't get an argument
I don't know what to say..
I'd never called Martina a bad name at all
I'd never, i don't even wanna
You called me a bad duck before
I called you a bad duck but those were like funny school
You called me a dibble donkey and I didn't like that, remember?
I didn't call her donkey per se
It was like bunny and duck
put that together and that sounds like
DUNNCKY!!
Duck + Bunny = DUNNCKY
When you called me a dunncky I was so sad for like 5 minutes
So in our perspective, it seems like a lot of people's fight has to do something
with stress that they have
either with their job
or the money, or the living situations
But, none of that affected us
because no matter what what happens
we're a team with each other
and we're trying to help each other to be happy
like our number one goal is to make sure that the other person is happy
So I guess the point we're getting that is
we're living in the present
we don't know what is going to happen
we don't know if one of us will get sick
if one of us get hit by a car
Hey, we're living in Korea
cars can hit right ahead to us everyday
That's right, the important thing is to enjoy each others company
every single day
Never take the person for granted
I always think what my life would not be without Simon
and then I get all sad and I cry and get teary
especially when I read Zombie comics
it makes me so scary and so sad
Martina has like Zombie nightmares like every three days
I don't understand what is wrong with me
and I'm really scared of zombies
and I keep watching zombie shows
and then I feel sad an worried that someones gonna attack you
I'll kill that zombie so good
So more of the story is that if you wanna appreciate your partner a lot more
watch a lot of zombie fiction
and then think about loosing that person then it would be so sad
No, that's not the real moral
zombies...
we should get some more patch and chain saws and treadmills
we have already go like 6 chain saws
treadmills outside our door
What is a treadmill?
When you walk,
like you step on your food?
Oh, one last thing I have to clarify
Lot of people keep asking if Simon feel jealous when I fangirl over TOP
And truthfully I hem it a lot for the videos
because I know that other people are interested in fangirling
Now, if you ask me as a rapper
I'm gonna pick TOP over Simon
because Simon kinda sucks at rapping
Martina hasn't actually heard the full depth of my rap skills
but I'm sure that I could bust a little of freestyle
I feel a little concerned about that
Simon go..go
rap about deers
Yah...i'm definitely picking TOP as the rapper
But for husband material
100% my Dothraki man   warrior
HUH!
I have to mention Simon is like 3 times the size of TOP
So that's it for this week's TLDR
I'm sorry that you didn't get the juicy details that you wanted
but we just don't argue with each other
Oh, we argue over pizza
pepperoni mushrooms and hawaiian
If you have a question that you want us to answer next week's TLDR
Leave your question in the comment section below
And don't forget to check on the questions that are already asked
you should thumb them up so that it could get in the top of the page
and then we could pick your question
like why Simon has sucky taste in pizza
Why do have the worst taste in pizza
Everyone like pepperoni and mushrooms
No they don't
Yes they do hawaiian can be weird
I think sometimes we should
People don't like mushrooms mushrooms are fungus
who wants to eat a fungus?
Fungus are mungus...
Why don't we have half and half pizza
Ohhh......
My hands are throbbing
My hands are really soar now
It's like woom woom
woom woom woom woom woom woom

comments.text:
Me too Martina! I feel the same way about zombies. In my mind they're real 
and they're coming!  0_0   And my husband and I are the same way. People 
ask us if we ever get into fights and to be honest, we don't. We've been 
together 10 years , living together 3 of those years. I feel that if people 
were more understanding and communicated their feelings with each other 
more, there would be less fights. Too many people want to be the right one 
in the relationship, but part of being in a relationship is compromising 
and being understanding. In all honesty we usually bicker over what to eat. 
That's it...he's picky and I'm the fat ass hahahhaha﻿

comments.author: ALX BO

comments.text:
Well that was anti-climatic! lol! This video makes me feel really shitty 
about my relationship lmao! I have been married for almost 9 years (this 
july) and my husband and I love each other very much, but we fight BAD. We 
fight SOOOO hard! I think it's because we are both very VERY stubborn, we 
both always have to be right and we both always have to have the last word. 
We also are both short tempered. We are so much alike that it's scary, and 
that why we get along so well but also why we don't get along so well, if 
that makes sense lol. Sometimes I joke that we must be Italian or something 
because we are very hot-headed and very passionate (I hope that's not 
racist, i'm not meaning it to be racist, I apologize if that offends 
anyone). We fight hard but we also love hard, too. Our relationship reminds 
me of that Haagen Dazs Gelato commercial where the couple is speaking 
Italian lol. Both of us are too prideful to admit when we're wrong and it's 
something that we're working on. I don't mind disagreeing but the yelling 
gets old and it is taking a toll on our relationship. Also, when we get 
really angry we say hurtful things that we later apologize for and say we 
didn't mean, but it still hurts. We are working on our anger and trying to 
disagree like rational adults instead of being so quick to anger and going 
from simple disagreeing to rage in like, 3 seconds.﻿
comments.author: kjjjacobs13

comments.text:
your relationship sounds a lot like me and my husband. when we were first 
dating we fought a lot even five years in we would still argue with each 
other but over time we mellowed out a lot, we still have disagreements and 
(i wont lie i definitely still have a mouth on me when im hormonal) but 
we've learned to communicate and if were really too heated over something 
we stop and take a break from each other for a few hours and then come back 
and try talking it out when we cooled down. Every relationship is different 
I definitely envy theirs but I like the special bond I have with my husband 
and wouldn't change it for anything  im sure you feel the same way about 
yours, give it time and a little bit of patience (I know the patience part 
can be hard) and you start to realize you prefer to laugh, joke around and 
smile with your lover more than argue with them and your pride and ego 
subside. keep at it because it will definitely get better :) <3
comments.author: Saundra Ramroop

together, it's fine.
